entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.2°C

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
